ValidationRule.description: Quote pricing details req'd @ Proposal Presented
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits") &&
AND(
OR(
ISBLANK( Policy_Fee__c), ISBLANK( Premium__c), ISBLANK( State_Tax__c), ISBLANK( Wholesale_Fee__c), ISBLANK( Commission_Rate__c)),
OR(
ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Approved/Closed Won" )))
